entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:45 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 12:56 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: S 32 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
